title: Ham and Cheese Sandwich
directions: Spread mayonnaise on one slice of bread and mustard on the other.
Place the slices of bread on a dish with condiment facing up.
On one slice of bread place the slices of ham and cheese alternating them.
Place the remaining slice of bread on top of the one with the ham and cheese

title: Omelette du Fromage
directions: Scramble the eggs in a bowl.
Fry the onion in a frying pan for about 5 minutes, then set aside.
In the same frying pan, pour the egg and let cook for about 1-2 minutes
Add the cooked onion and the grated cheese onto the egg and let cook for another 2 minutes
Fold the omelette in half and let it sit for 1 minute, then turn it onto the other side.
Let it cook for 1 more minute, and then serve.

title: Strawberries and Cream
directions: Cut the strawberries in thin slices and sprinkle some sugar on them
Mix the condensed milk and cream in a bowl.
Add the strawberries to the cream and mix them in.

title: Aubergine Parmigiana
directions: Preheat oven to 200Â°C
Next, prepare tomato sauce - finely chop onions and garlic and fry in olive oil for a couple of minutes in a saucepan
Add tomato puree, bay leaves, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper to saucepan and let simmer for a few minutes
While the sauce cooks, cut aubergines and mozarella cheese into thin slices
Once the sauce is cooked and the aubergines and cheese are sliced, arrange them in alternating layers in a baking tray, starting with a thin layer of sauce at the bottom
Put the tray in the oven and bake for 30 minutes

title: Machaca con Huevo
directions: Blend tomatoes and garlic in blender.
Scramble eggs in a bowl.
Heat oil in a frying pan at medium heat and fry dry beef for a couple of minutes
Dice onion and add it to the frying pan, fry until onion is fully cooked
Add blended tomatoes and garlic, season with cumin, salt, and pepper. Stir everything and simmer until the tomatoes are cooked.
Add scrambled eggs to sauce, stir together and cook until eggs are set.

title: Banana Bread
directions: In one bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, blend shortening, sugar, and lemon rind, until creamy.
Beat eggs and banana pulp into the shortening mix.
Add the dry ingredients to the shortening mixture in 3 part. Beat the batter after each addition, until smooth.
Fold in the nuts and the apricots.
Place batter in a greased bread pan and bake for 1 hour or until done.
Let it cool before slicing.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
directions: Cream the butter, then add both kinds of sugar gradually and beat until creamy.
Beat in the egg.
Sift and sitr in the flour, salt, and baking soda.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop the batter from a teaspoon onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes.
